attributes.action: Stop plans to spend £10 million of tax payers money on Government private plane
attributes.additional_details:
Government's plan for a private plane is a false economy and a vanity project. Landing, parking, boarding, leaving and take off fees have not been considered. David Cameron is the only leader in the G20 who doesn't have a plane. Meanwhile public services have suffered severe cuts. David Cameron has flown out to meet President Barack Obama on British Airways in a more cash conscious move. 
SOURCES: http://goo.gl/tTVIKE    http://goo.gl/J1EVki http://goo.gl/UJzj
attributes.background: Our government is spending £10 million to turn a military plane into a private plane for David Cameron and Senior Ministers. They made damaging cuts in the name of austerity. They also tell us, we are all in it together. A private plane is not an example of us all being in it together.
